mapper.sql: record_id, account_id, user_id, product_id, money, money_operate, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, state
mapper.insert: insert into t_account_record(record_id, account_id, user_id, product_id, money, money_operate, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, state) values (#{recordId}, #{accountId}, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{money}, #{moneyOperate}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{state})
mapper.update: update t_account_record set account_id = #{accountId}, user_id = #{userId}, product_id = #{productId}, money = #{money}, money_operate = #{moneyOperate}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_by = #{createBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_by = #{updateBy}, state = #{state} where record_id = #{recordId}
